metadata.title: CVE-2023-52821 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/panel: fix a possible null pointer dereference Inversatile_panel_get_modes(), the return value of drm_mode_duplicate() isassigned to mode, which will lead to a NULL pointer dereference on failureof drm_mode_duplicate(). Add a check to avoid npd.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
